contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = You Are Being Videotaped | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Your Enemies Friends]] | Cover = Youarebeingvideotaped.jpg | Released = March 9, 2004 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Alternative rock]] | Length = | Label = [[Buddyhead Records]] | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = ''[[The Wiretap EP]]''<br>(2002) | This album = ''You Are Being Videotaped''<br>(2004) | Next album = }} '''''You Are Being Videotaped''''' is the first full-length release by [[Your Enemies Friends]]. It was released March 9, 2004 on [[Buddyhead Records]]. The song "Back of a Taxi" was sampled by [[hip hop]] act [[Grayskul]] on their song "Haunted" featured in their 2008 release [[Bloody Radio]] ==Track listing== # "The One Condition" # "Back of a Taxi" # "Business French Kiss" # "How to Deconstruct" # "Unusable Signal" # "Pollution of Nonsense" # "Columnist" # "You Are Being Videotaped" # "Census" # "Excommunication List" # "The Comfort System" # "Easy Assault" ==External links== *[http://www.yourenemiesfriends.com Your Enemies Friends official website] *[http://www.myspace.com/yourenemiesfriends Your Enemies Friends on MySpace] [[Category:Your Enemies Friends albums]] [[Category:2004 debut albums]] {{2000s-indie-rock-album-stub}}
